body.name: Swivel Bar Stools Set of 3, 26 Inch Faux Leather Counter Height Barstools with Back and Metal Frame, Upholstered Counter Stools with Footrest for Kitchen Island, Dining Room, Pub, Saddle Brown
features: Aesthetic & Stylish Barstools: The elegant barrel-curved back and upholstered seat, making this bar height stool a classic mid century modern chic, suitable for any style of your home decorations. And it's a perfect addition to your home bar, kitchen island and dining area

Free Swivel Stool Seat: Our modern barstool featured a 360 swivel plate and footrest, maximizes your comfort, stimulates thought processes and can even serve a mini workout for your core. Exceptional comfortable and ergonomic

Cozy Seat & Back: The counter stool seat and backrest are filled with high-density sponge,making your sitting more relaxable, the easy-to-clean soft linen and faux leather fabric creates a casual vibe in your space and gives you everyday comfort
Long Lasting Bar Chair: Sturdy metal legs in uncomplicated modern matte black finish, the x-shaped leg construction increases the durability, offering a 300 lbs weight capacity
Set of 3. Overall dimension: 18.1" D x 19.4" W x 39.3" H. Seat Dimension: 17.3" D x 19.4" W. Seat Height: 26.9" H. Recommended Counter Height: 35"-37" H. Weight capacity: 300 lbs

Erdoru Elegant Mid Century Modern Counter Height Swivel Bar Stools with Back Metal Legs Immerse yourself in the timeless appeal of our counter height bar stools. With comfortable restback and cushions full filled with sponges and the 360-degree swivel seat, ensuring comfort and effortless dining and socilizing. Enhance your space with these comfortable and versatile swivel bar stools
Details Overall Dimensions: 21.8''D x 19.4''W x 39.3''HSeat Dimensions: 17.3''D x 19.4''W x 13.5''HSeat Height - Floor to Seat 26.9''Capacity：300 lbsLeg Color: Light Grey

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable. Stylish. Affordale.
reviews.reviewText: Took a gamble on these chairs since there were no previous reviews when I bought them. Gamble paid off! Great chairs. Look great at our kitchen bar top. Comfortable. Easy to assemble. Took me (one person) a little over an hour to assemble all three chairs. At $100 a chair, you can't beat it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great luxury bar stool
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic material gives this bar stool high-end touch feeling. I could sit and rotate confidently with its super stable structure. It is a GREAT chair for my kitchen island.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Took longer than instructions stated
reviews.reviewText: One chair had no hole so I had to improvise but because I’m handy it all worked out. I would say alone it could take up to 30 mins per chair but after the first it get easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: Purchased 4 swivels chairs and the color were the perfect brown, it’s stylish, comfortable, sturdy and easy to clean. So glad I purchased the chairs!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sturdy stools with swivel
reviews.reviewText: These bar stools are nicely built and durable. The height is easy to climb and sit. Esthetically appealing look with comfortable back. The material used in the stools gives fancy look and the swivel feature makes it stand out. The best part about the material is that its easy to clean and gets no stains which makes it ideal for homes with children. The instructions to assemble were simple to follow and took around 30 minutes for 3 chairs with 2 people. Overall, I am impressed with its quality and design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I spent two years searching for the perfect shorter bar stools for my kitchen, and I couldn’t be happier with my find! The simple design, combined with their durability, makes them an excellent choice. Not only are they comfortable, but they also look fantastic in my kitchen, and the color is spot on. These bar stools have truly elevated the aesthetics of my space. If you’re in search of stylish, durable, and comfortable shorter bar stools, look no further. Highly satisfied!
